content: We are living in a diverse world. We need products and solutions that serve people from all walks of life. We need diverse founders to create these companies. In a recent New Yorker profile on YC’s President, Sam Altman, YC alumni Sebastian Wallin said, “YC provides instant entrée to Silicon Valley — a community that, despite its meritocratic rhetoric, typically requires a “warm intro” from a colleague, who is usually a white man.”
